ComicInfo.Summary:
Emotional Ebola - Part Three: Fighting the Boob triggers a flashback for the Red Hook.
Chase the Lady, Chapter 14: Rachel doesn't want to be the vessel for the goddess.
Just Dessert: One of the storytellers is a liar.
Brooklyn Blood, Chapter 14: O'Connor and Hasan fight an Old One in the East River.
Death Rides a Bullet: Chapter 06: Back from the dead the Sinister Black fights the Maniak device.
Kara Böcek, Chapter 4: The Nazis are close behind the Black Beetle on his quest.
ComicInfo.Writer: Carla Speed McNeil,Dan Jolley,Dean Haspiel,Francesco Francavilla,John Nadeau,Kaare Kyle Andrews,Paul Levitz,Kaare Andrews,Dean Haspiel,Carla Speed McNeil,John Nadeau,Dan Jolley,Paul Levitz,Kaare Andrews,Francesco Francavilla
